content: . At the 4-week follow-up visit, we assessed the patientsâ€™ quality of life using the Atrial Fibrillation Effect on Quality-of-Life questionnaire (AFEQT), with scores ranging from 0 to 100 and higher scores indicating a better quality of life.15 All secondary end points of the trial are listed in Table S2 in the Supplementary Appendix.
query: amiodarone beta-blockers quality of life functional capacity exercise tolerance atrial fibrillation patient reported outcomes
